1.text: And it will be as the wall was built, and I shall set up the doors, and the gate-keepers, and those singing, and the Levites will be appointed.

2.text: And I shall command Hanani my brother, and Hananiah chief of the fortress, over Jerusalem, for he is as a man of truth, and fearing God above many.

3.text: And it will be said to them, The gates of Jerusalem shall not be opened till the sun being hot; and till they standing by shall shut the doors and fasten: and setting up watches of the inhabitants of Jerusalem, a man in his watch, and a man before his house.

4.text: And the city broad of hands, and great and the people few in its midst, and the houses not built.

5.text: And my God will give to my heart, and I shall gather together the nobles and the prefects and the people, to be enrolled: and I shall find the writing of the register of those coming up among the first, and I shall find written as it.

6.text: These the sons of the province coming up from the captivity of the: exile which Nebuchadnezzar king of Babel carried into exile; and they will turn back to Jerusalem and to Judah, a man to his city;

7.text: Those coming with Zerubbabel, Joshua, Nehemiah, Azariah, Nahamani, Mordecai, Bilshan, Mispereth, Bigvai, Nehum, Baanah. The number of the men of the people of Israel:

8.text: The sons of Parosh, two thousand one hundred and seventy and two.

9.text: The sons of Shephatiah, three hundred seventy and two.

10.text: The sons of Arah, six hundred fifty and two.

11.text: The sons of Pahath-Moab to the sons of Joshua and Joab, two thousand and eight hundred and eighteen.

12.text: The sons of Elam, a thousand two hundred fifty and four.

13.text: The sons of Zattu, eight hundred forty and five.

14.text: The sons of Zaccai, seven hundred and sixty.

15.text: The sons of Binnui, six hundred forty and eight.

16.text: The sons of Bebai, six hundred twenty and eight.

17.text: The sons of Azgad, two thousand three hundred twenty and two.

18.text: The sons of Adonikam, six hundred sixty and seven.

19.text: The sons of Bigvai, two thousand sixty and seven.

20.text: The sons of Adin, six hundred fifty and five.

21.text: The sons of Ater to Hezekiah, ninety and eight.

22.text: The sons of Hashum, three hundred twenty and eight.

23.text: The sons of Bezai, three hundred twenty and four.

24.text: The sons of Hariph, a hundred and twelve.

25.text: The sons of Gibeon, ninety and five.

26.text: The men of the house of bread and Netophah, a hundred eighty and eight.

27.text: The men of Anathoth, a hundred twenty and eight.

28.text: The men of the house strong as death, forty and two.

29.text: The men of the city of forests, Chephirah and Beeroth, seven hundred forty and three.

30.text: The men of Ramah and Gaba, six hundred twenty and one.

31.text: The men of Michmas, a hundred and twenty and two.

32.text: The men of the house of God and Ai, a hundred twenty and three.

33.text: The men of the other Nebo, fifty and two.

34.text: The sons of the other Elam, a thousand two hundred fifty and four.

35.text: The sons of Harim, three hundred and twenty.

36.text: The sons of Jericho, three hundred forty and five.

37.text: The sons of Lod, Hadid, and Ono, seven hundred twenty and one.

38.text: The sons of Senaah, three thousand nine hundred and thirty.

39.text: The priests: the sons of Jedaiah for the house of Joshua, nine hundred seventy and three.

40.text: The sons of Immer, a thousand fifty and two.

41.text: The sons of Pashur, a thousand two hundred forty and seven.

42.text: The sons of Harim, a thousand and seventeen.

43.text: The Levites: the sons of Joshua to Kadmiel, to the sons to Hodevah, seventy and four.

44.text: Those singing: the sons of Asaph, a hundred forty and eight.

45.text: The gate keepers: the sons of Shallum, the sons of Ater, the sons of Talmon, the sons of Akkub, the sons of Hatita, the sons of Shobai, a hundred thirty and eight.

46.text: The Nethinims: the sons of Ziha, the sons of Hasupha, the sons of Tabbaoth,

47.text: The sons of Keros, the sons of Sia, the sons of Padon,

48.text: The sons of Lebana, the sons of Hagaba, the sons of Shalmi.

49.text: The sons of Hanan, the sons of Giddel, the sons of Gahar,

50.text: The sons of Reaiah, the sons of Rezin, the sons of Nekoda,

51.text: The sons of Gazzam, the sons of Uzza, the sons of Paseah,

52.text: The sons of Bezai, the sons of Meunim, the sons of Nephishesim,

53.text: The sons of Bakbuk, the sons of Hakupha, the sons of Harhur,

54.text: The sons of Bazlith, the sons of Mehida, the sons of Harsha,

55.text: The sons of Barkos, the sons of Sisera, the sons of Thamah,

56.text: The sons of Neziah, the sons of Hatipha,

57.text: The sons of Solomon’s servant’s: the sons of Sotai, the sons of Sophereth, the sons of Perida,

58.text: The sons of Jaala, the sons of Darkon, the sons of Giddel,

59.text: The sons of Shephatiah, the sons of Hattil, the sons of Pochereth of Zebaim, the sons of Amon.

60.text: All the Nethinims, and the sons of Solomon’s servants, three hundred ninety and two.

61.text: And these going up from Tel-Mela, Tel-Harsha, Cherub, Addon, and Immer: and they could not announce their father’s house, and their seed, if they were from Israel.

62.text: The sons of Delaiah, the sons of Tobiah, the sons of Nekoda, six hundred forty and two.

63.text: And from the priests: the sons of Habaiah, the sons of Koz, the sons of Barzillai, who took from the daughters of Barzillai the Gileadite a wife, and he will be called for their name.

64.text: These sought their writing of those being enrolled, and it was not found: and they will be defiled from the priesthood.

65.text: And the Tirshatha will say to them that they shall not eat from the holy of holies till a priest stood up for Lights and Truth.

66.text: All the convocation as one four myriads two thousand three hundred and sixty.

67.text: Besides their servants and their maids, these seven thousand three hundred thirty and seven: and to them men singing and women singing, two hundred and forty and five:

68.text: Their horses, seven hundred thirty and six: their mules two hundred forty and five:

69.text: The camels four hundred thirty and five: and the asses, six thousand seven hundred and twenty.

70.text: And from the sum of heads of the fathers they gave for the work. The Tirshatha gave to the treasure gold a thousand drachmas, fifty vases, thirty and five hundred priests’ tunics.

71.text: And from the chiefs of the fathers they gave to the treasure of the work, gold, two myriads of drachmas, and silver, two thousand two hundred portions.

72.text: And what the rest of the people gave was gold, two myriads of drachmas, and silver, two thousand portions, and priests’ tunics, sixty and seven.

73.text: And there dwelt the priests and the Levites and the gatekeepers, and those singing, and from the people and the Nethinims, and all Israel in their cities; and the seventh month will draw near, and the sons of Israel in their cities.
